p:
The % inhibition was figured out with the following formula;
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \% {\text{ Inhibition }} = \, \left[ {\left( {{\text{IA}} - {\text{Inhibitor}}} \right)/{\text{IA}}} \right] \times {1}00 $$\end{document}
%
Inhibition
=
IA - Inhibitor
/ IA
Ã— 100
where the inhibition is expressed as enzyme activity with adding inhibitor; IA as 100% activity of enzyme in the absence of inhibitor.
COX-1 and COX-2 inhibition assay
